text: Self-confidence is built over time through consistent effort and reflection
IF  THEN Actively seek positive reinforcement to counter feelings of inferiority
CLAIM: Rejection of ideas is often linked to personal insecurities
Confront interpersonal challenges directly rather than avoiding them.
Self-reliance is achieved through active engagement and cooperation in society.
IF  THEN Address relationship issues proactively to prevent them from worsening.
IF  THEN Acknowledge personal responsibility in shaping relationships and outcomes.
CLAIM: Relationships require ongoing effort and adaptation to maintain harmony.
CLAIM: Humans inherently seek ways to control others to avoid confronting their own shortcomings.
Choose actions that lead to future benefits
IF  THEN Act with purpose to achieve desired outcomes
CLAIM: Intentional actions yield specific outcomes
